name: Playlists.Relationships
desc: The relationships for a playlist resource.

items.name: curator
items.desc: The curator that created the playlist. By default, curator includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: None

items.name: library
items.desc: Library playlist for a catalog playlist if added to library.

items.name: tracks
items.desc: The songs and music videos included in the playlist. By default, tracks includes objects. Fetch limits: 100 default, 300 maximum
